messages.message: Is there a way to run only one python test file in `api-servers` ? I've tried `make run-test-local TEST_NAMES=instabase.handler.api.v1.test_account.TestUsersView.test_list_users` but it will still run all unittests in api-server
@Jag helped me out!!! Thanks a lot

I think the test string is just not working as expected. Jag suggested me do the following instead:

1. add `ibtest` to `.zshrc`
```ibtest () {
	testmodule="instabase_unit_tests.instabase.$1"
	echo "Building for testing..."
	make clean build build-test copy-unit-test
	echo "Running tests in $testmodule"
	cd build/test/py
	python -m unittest $testmodule
	cd ../../..
}```
2. Then run `ibtest handler.api.v1.test_account.TestUsersView.test_list_users` in order to run this test  (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/webserver/api-server/test/unit/py/instabase/handler/api/v1/test_account.py#L301)
